author: Samsung
description:
After a long day, turn off the stress and turn on something better — with just a click. 💫
Ask and you shall receive - instant answers, personalized recommendations, live information, and so much more. Samsung Vision AI Companion is here to make life not just easier, but a little more exciting. 🎤✨

#VisionAICompanion #SamsungVisionAI #VisionAI #SamsungAITV #AITV
title: Ask your companion anything: After work | Samsung

author: Samsung
description:
This video introduces the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, an all-in-one washer dryer with advanced voice control for easy, hands-free laundry. Want to simply say, “Set the finish time of the washer to 6 PM” and have it done?  With voice activation, simply ask and get instant answers. The AI Home’s 7" wide smart touch screen lets you monitor and control multiple smart appliances right from one screen. Set laundry end times by voice, check appliance status, and enjoy seamless integration with your smart home devices.  Experience smarter, simpler laundry with the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo — making your daily chores easier than ever.
Learn more: smsng.co/bespoke-home

Q : Can I schedule my washer to finish at a specific time using voice commands?
A : Yes, you can set the laundry to finish at your preferred time simply by saying, for example, “Set the finish time of the washer to 6 PM” This feature helps you manage your time better without manual adjustments.

title: Bespoke AI Laundry Combo | Smart & Connected | Samsung

author: Samsung
description:
This video shows how the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo, an all-in-one washer dryer, makes laundry easier. Worried about limited space for your washer and dryer? Discover how the Bespoke AI Laundry Combo saves space, skips the hassle of moving clothes, and speeds up drying with advanced Heat Pump technology—cutting drying time significantly compared to traditional condensing combos. Enjoy fast washing to drying in one smart upgrade. Save space. Save time. Skip the hassle.
Learn more: smsng.co/bespoke-home

Q: Can an all-in-one washer dryer really wash and dry my clothes in just one step?  
A: Yes! Just load your laundry, choose your settings, and everything—from washing to drying—happens automatically in one machine.  

Q: How does it work?
A: It uses advanced heat pump drying technology, circulating warm air to remove moisture.

Q: Is it reliable and worth it?
